description: Longer-horizon requests phrased by a non-technical user.

experiments.title: Checklist + apply
experiments.prompt: I'm worried this service might not shut down cleanly. Please use the repository at https://github.com/caddyserver/caddy. Make a checklist you would use to review that, then apply it to that repo and tell me what you find. Keep it concise.

experiments.title: Endpoints overview
experiments.prompt: Please use the repository at https://github.com/caddyserver/caddy. Figure out what HTTP endpoints this service exposes and summarize them for me.

experiments.title: Dependency review
experiments.prompt: Please use the repository at https://github.com/caddyserver/caddy. Review the dependencies and tell me which ones might be risky or need upgrades, and why.
